body.name: Organic Bamboo Diapers, Micro Cushion Comfort & Other Compostable Plant-Based Materials, Size 3 112ct
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
features: 🎋 Bamboo Sourced from Certified Farms: Our diapers use bamboo sourced from certified Eco-Cert and FSC farms, ensuring sustainability.
🌱 Natural, Sustainable & Eco-friendly: Our diapers are a natural, sustainable, and eco-friendly choice for your baby.
👌 Optimal Performance with Size Recommendation: We recommend purchasing 1 size down for a better fit and optimal performance.
💦 Super Absorbent Bamboo-Pulp Core: Our diapers have a super absorbent bamboo-pulp core, keeping your baby's skin dry and comfortable.
😊🛡️ Comfortable and Safe: Our diapers feature a Micro Cushion Contact Cover and plant-based backsheet barrier, free from Chlorine, Latex, and Phthalates, ensuring comfort and safety for your baby.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clearly Herbal Bamboo Diapers Micro Cushion Comfort from Plant-Based Materials Ensures a dry experience with our super absorbent Bamboo-Pulp core which effectively absorbs and channels urine quickly, ultimately making Clearly Herbal Bamboo Diapers comfortable and soft on your baby’s delicate skinMicro Cushion Contact Cover for ultimate comfort. Plant-based backsheet barrier. Free from Chlorine, Latex, and Phthalates.Our Bamboo Pulp is sourced from Bamboo farms certified by Eco-Cert* and FSC** * Certificate of Operation issued by ECOCERT SA - 6/24/2019 ** FSC Code BV-COC-162895 issued 10/6/2021

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite diapers!
reviews.reviewText: These are hands down the best diapers we've tried, and we tried MANY. They fit great, don't leak, they're really soft, not too bulky, and there's no weird smell (looking at you Pampers). They do run large, so unless you have a very chunky baby, you want to get a size down from the recommendations on the box. My 19.5 lb son is still very comfortable in size 3 (12-18 lbs). My only wish is that they were more readily available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leaked overnight for several nights

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Diapers were great but package was missing 3 packs!
reviews.reviewText: These diapers were good. They fit well. They prevented blowouts. I like the way you looked and fit on our baby. However I ordered a pack of four and only got one so we had to get a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I tried it! Take a chance!
reviews.reviewText: I swore by bamboo nature and have used them for many years but unfortunately they recently stopped producing the classic diaper to come out with a new over night version. In the meantime I was out of luck and didn't know what to do!!! I am SO glad I tried these diapers! I am comfortable with the materials used, they do not smell, they are lightweight and not as bulky, but are still super absorbent! My daughter was about 20lbs when I started these and used to wear a size 5 in bamboo nature because their sizing is so crazy. I found a size chart for these diapers somewhere online and it said to get a size 3 based on her weight. When asking about scents within the Amazon comments I was told to order a size down from what you would normally. I was super confused so I ordered a size 2 thinking they were going to be horribly big. The size 2 I would say was a bit small but they still fit and did not leak! It looked like she was wearing standard underwear! I was able to use up the whole box before ordering a size 3 which I feel is a better fit. If you're looking for a great option in place of bamboo nature I would definitely say take a chance. They are so much more cost effective and I am still taking care of my baby girl by choosing high quality materials I feel she is safe wearing. You won't be sorry giving these a chance! I bet they will become your new favorite as they have for me.
